title: UFS 4.0 promises significantly faster speeds and improved power efficiency
content:
Universal Flash Storage has become hugely popular among Android smartphones. Not too long ago, UFS was only found in flagships and higher-end mid-range phones. But as the technology has become cheaper, it has largely replaced eMMC across budget and affordable mid-range smartphones as the flash storage of choice. UFS 3.1 was announced in 2020 and

The post UFS 4.0 promises significantly faster speeds and improved power efficiency appeared first on XDA.
description: Samsung Semiconductor has officially announced UFS 4.0, the next iteration of Universal Flash Storage. Read on.
